You can also find the standard Dyson V11 Cordless Vacuum package at the same rate, with the difference here being the included attachment tools.

items.title: Target early Black Friday LEGO sale now live: Up to 40% discounts, including Advent calendars at new lows from $18
items.summary:
Target has launched its limited LEGO early Black Friday deals through November 8, giving us some significant savings on a large collection of building sets, including some of the 2025 Advent Calendars. Among the lineup, you can find sets like the 2025 LEGO Star Wars Advent Calendar at $26.99 shipped, which matches the rate at Amazon, as well as the 2025 LEGO City Advent Calendar at $17.99 shipped, which is unavailable at Amazon, but does beat out the early Black Friday deals from Best Buy. These two would normally fetch $45 and $30 were it not for the discounts, which we’ve recently seen taken to these rates for the first time, giving you 40% markdowns to new all-time low prices, saving you up to $18 off the going rate in the process. Head below for more on these and the other sets we’re seeing included in this sale.
